headline: AT&T: The Telecom Giant To Buy
summary: AT&T has doubled its stock price since 2023, driven by network modernization and a renewed focus on core telecom operations. Click here to read why T is a Buy.

headline: Verizon to report 3Q earnings October 29, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, Oct. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ) will report third-quarter 2025 earnings on Wednesday, October 29, 2025. The company will present results on a webcast beginning at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time. Access instructions and third-quarter 2025 earnings materials will be available at 6:30 a.m. ET on Verizon’s Investor Relations website, https://www.verizon.com/about/investors. headline: Semtech Showcases Public Safety 5G Router Portfolio at IACP 2025
summary: CAMARILLO, Calif., October 15, 2025--Semtech Corporation (Nasdaq: SMTC), a leading provider of high-performance semiconductor, Internet of Things (IoT) systems and cloud connectivity service solutions, will demonstrate its growing family of 5G routers with network slicing capabilities at the International Association of Chiefs of Police (IACP) Annual Conference and Exposition 2025, from October 18-21 at the Colorado Convention Center in Denver.
